Will is an Assistant Professor of Medicine and Associate Physician. His research 
interests include pulmonary arterial hypertension, cell metabolism, adaptation to 
hypoxia, and network medicine. He is also the Scientific Director of the [BWH 
Seahorse Core](https://researchcores.partners.org/sea/about) facility.
